title: Vote for JartonMC
subtitle: Help us grow! Vote on these sites and get sweet rewards in return.

faq.question: Vote not working?
faq.answer: Sometimes it takes a few mins to register. Try '/vote check' in-game or ping staff on Discord if it's been more than 10 minutes.

faq.question: Used wrong username
faq.answer: Oops! Votes are tied to whatever name you put in. You'll have to wait for the daily reset to vote again with the right name.

faq.question: Can I vote on mobile?
faq.answer: Yep! All these sites work fine on mobile browsers. Just make sure to use your exact Minecraft username.
